author: ChatGPT
content: 알겠어! 이모지 수를 줄이고 더 깔끔한 스타일로 다듬은 영문 인스타그램 캡션 버전 이야: --- Fleeta Web Viewer is coming March 31 Exclusively for Fleet Plan users at app.fleeta.io Limited-time offer: Upgrade by May 31 and get the Fleet Plan at 50 OFF 12 months discounted 1st month FREE Fleet Plan includes: - Multi Live View up to 4 dash cams - Geofencing with enter/exit alerts - 90-day GPS logs Video On Map - 15GB Cloud storage per dash cam - Email notifications and more Claim your offer now link BlackVue Fleeta FleetPlan DashcamPromo VehicleTracking --- 필요하면 스토리용 짧은 문구나 배너용 문장도 만들어줄 수 있어!
